changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery) INSERT INTO users (name, surname, age, gender, username, password, inserted_date_at_utc, updated_date_at_utc) SELECT 'Name' || s.sery, 'Surname' || s.sery, FLOOR(RANDOM() * (100 - 1) + 1), CASE WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN 'MALE'::gender_enum ELSE 'FEMALE'::gender_enum END, 'Username' || s.sery, 'Password' || s.sery, NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (499 - 1) + 1)) * INTERVAL '1 day' FROM series s
